ig_desc.message: Disable Instagram Shorts, videos, comments, suggestions wall, vanity metrics, homepage recomendations, trending... and many more.

ig_shorttitle.message: IGPlus - Remove Instagram Reels, Explore Page

sp_desc.message: Hide Spotify "Now Playing" View, disable albums, change themes, fonts, disable videos to reduce bandwidth usage... and many more.

lc_desc.message: Add new Lichess.org themes, pieces, and boards. Disable annoying notifications, change fonts... and many more.

ch_desc.message: Add new Chess.com themes, pieces, and boards. Disable annoying notifications, change fonts... and many more.

memento_desc.message: A minimalist, customizable start page extension for your browser. Open-source, lightweight, and secure, Memento enhances your browsing experience with intuitive customization and a clean design.

ec_desc.message: A simple calculator extension for performing basic arithmetic calculations.

igp_desc.message: Disable Instagram Shorts, videos, comments, suggestions wall, vanity metrics, homepage recomendations, trending... and many more.

igp_shorttitle.message: IGPlus - Remove Instagram Reels, Explore Page

sect_recommend_desc.message: Get more extensions to maximize your productivity and streamline your web usage!

sect_donate_desc.message: Since all of our projects is entirely free and doesn’t collect nor sell your data, we don’t earn any money out of this project, apart from donations. Supporting our work financially is very important if you want us to keep updating it, and we appreciate every single donation.
